wikipedia_page.main: Stefan Clive Reif  (born 21 January 1944) is professor emeritus at the University of Cambridge.  He was born in Edinburgh. He has a PhD from University College London and a Doctor of Literature from Cambridge.

link_mentions.page: List of people associated with University College London
response: * Stefan Reif, studentship, later Professor of Hebrew at the University of Cambridge

When describing the creation of the UTJ Stefan Reif refers to the founding members of the UTJ as "traditionalists" within the Conservative movement.Judaism and Hebrew Prayer, Stefan C. Reif, Cambridge Univ. Press, 1995.

link_mentions.page: Dropsie College for Hebrew and Cognate Learning
response: * Stefan Reif, Jewish researcher – assistant professor of Hebrew, 1972–1973
